verbose_text: Collectively, these results establish that canonical activation of NLRP3 dependent caspase-1 by K + efflux in human and mouse cells triggers depletion of UBE2L3 that temporally correlates with caspase-1 activation and production of mature IL-1beta and is genetically uncoupled from pyroptotic cell death.
evidence: caspase-1 by K +  efflux in human and mouse cells triggers depletion of UBE2L3
